reviewText:
Santa isn't sane.  He's making a list, and checking it twice.  He's going to find out who's naughty... and slice!  Slashing through the snow, in his blood-red Santa suit, Harry has a satanic sack-full of little surprises!

Little Harry sees Mommy kissing Santa Claus.  But when the Jolly Old Elf goes for her garter belt, little Harry wants to go for the jugular!

Still warped after all these years, Harry now works in a toy factory, but would rather amuse himself with grown-up things like binoculars and open windows... Nobody's wild about Harry.

This year, Harry has plans for the holidays.  There's to be a mass murder, right after Mass... and the slay-ride begins!  Bolt your doors, lock your windows, and pour a bag of cement down your chimney.  He's a sick, sick St. Nick... and he's coming to town!
